Name: Keystones
About the game: Keystones is a simple game about colors and connections. At each level you must find the correct location of each colored key and activate all the links. Each of the 30 levels follows an elaborate flow to present, beyond the mechanics of the game, ever greater challenges involving logic and creativity, providing a pleasant experience.
Meta Title: Keystones: Mar 1, 2019, Growing Seed Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Keystones? Check out the release date (Mar 1, 2019), developer insights from Growing Seed Games, and a complete game summary.
